sentence: https://t.co/VK7Wmo8IdL — Fred Lucas (@FredLucasWH) April 15, 2022 Potential Vance challenger, Dem Rep. Tim Ryan, is already on the attack calling Vance a “silicon Valley elitist and a phony, and we’ll beat him come November”: It's official.
author: Greg P.
title: IT’S OFFICIAL: Donald Trump endorses J.D. Vance for the U.S. Senate in Ohio
